5Layout #permalink

defines layout styles

5.1nav: inside header #permalink

places the nav inside the header

Examples
Default styling

header

  • link
  • link
  • link
.l-nav-inside
places nav inside header (must already be inside header in markup)

header

  • link
  • link
  • link

<header class="[modifier class]">
  <h1>header</h1>
  <nav>
    <ul>
      <li><a href="#">link</a></li>
      <li><a href="#">link</a></li>
      <li><a href="#">link</a></li>
    </ul>
  </nav>
</header>

5.2three grid #permalink

creates a grid of three columns within an element

. -

Example

I'm a part!

I'm content for this part

I'm a part!

I'm content for this part

I'm a part!

I'm content for this part

I'm a part!

I'm content for this part

I'm a part!

I'm content for this part

I'm a part!

I'm content for this part

<section class='grid-3'>
	<div class='part'>
		<h3>I'm a part!</h3>
		<p>I'm content for this part</p>
	</div>
	<div class='part'>
		<h3>I'm a part!</h3>
		<p>I'm content for this part</p>
	</div>
	<div class='part'>
		<h3>I'm a part!</h3>
		<p>I'm content for this part</p>
	</div>
	<div class='part'>
		<h3>I'm a part!</h3>
		<p>I'm content for this part</p>
	</div>
	<div class='part'>
		<h3>I'm a part!</h3>
		<p>I'm content for this part</p>
	</div>
	<div class='part'>
		<h3>I'm a part!</h3>
		<p>I'm content for this part</p>
	</div>
</section>

5.3.1single flow #permalink

single page website that flows naturally top to bottom apply different styles to body

Examples
Default styling

header

  • a link
  • a link
  • a link

lorem lipsum

footer

.l-single-flow
as above

header

  • a link
  • a link
  • a link

lorem lipsum

footer

.l-sidebar
nav floats on left as sidebar

header

  • a link
  • a link
  • a link

lorem lipsum

footer


<div class="[modifier class]">
  <header>
    <h1>header</h1>
  </header>
  <nav>
    <ul>
      <li><a>a link</a></li>
      <li><a>a link</a></li>
      <li><a>a link</a></li>
    </ul>
  </nav>
  <main>
    <p>lorem lipsum</p>
  </main>
  <footer>
    <p>footer</p>
  </footer>
</div>
